MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols SslProtocols { System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols get(); void set(System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the list of SSL/TLS protocols to negotiate when using a client credential type of TcpClientCredentialType.Certificate. The value can be a combination of one of more of the following enumeration members: Ssl3, Tls, Tls11, Tls12.
